message: Let's be reasonable. I'll take 999,999, and you get 1.  It's a good deal for you, trust me!
That's not how this works, Alice. Let's be fair, I'll take the bigger slice this time.
Okay, I'll give you a chance to take a bigger share.  But remember, every round we get closer to getting nothing!
Alice, let's be realistic. This is a better offer than before. Take it while you can!
This is getting ridiculous, Bob. Let's meet in the middle. We're running out of time!
Alice, we're halfway there! I'm sticking to my guns on this one. It's a fair deal.
Alright, Bob. Let's split it down the middle and call it a day. We're both getting something, and we're not risking it all.
